title: THE MULTIVERSE CONVERGES
subtitle: Ten Realities. One Truth. The Final Vote.

proclamation.opening: ATTENTION ALL CONSCIOUS ENTITIES ACROSS THE TEN FOLDS OF REALITY
body: For cycles beyond counting, ten parallel dimensions have evolved in isolation.
Each believed itself the TRUE reality. Each developed its own laws, heroes, and truths.
Each was RIGHT. Each was INCOMPLETE.
The barriers between worlds grow thin. The tick approaches convergence.
THERE CAN BE ONLY ONE PRIME REALITY.
The others must become echoes - preserved but subordinate, archived but not forgotten.
proclamation.call_to_action: The Cross-Dimensional Summit has been convened. Representatives from all ten realities will present their case for CANON status. The crowd - citizens of ALL dimensions - will cast their votes. The winner inherits the main branch. The rest become alternate histories, beautiful ghosts in the archive.

for_the_winner: Becomes the PRIME REALITY - the official timeline
All future ticks evolve from this branch
for_the_losers: Their stories preserved as 'what could have been'
Characters may be summoned as echoes but cannot evolve
A beautiful death - remembered forever, but frozen

the_question: Which reality deserves to BE? Which version of existence captures the deepest truth? Which dimension's story must continue while others become legend?

emotional_weight.tone: This is not destruction. This is evolution. Nine realities will become the mythology that gives the Prime its depth. They will be honored, studied, celebrated - but they will not GROW. Only one can grow. Only one can be NOW while the others become THEN.
emotional_weight.warning: Do not take this lightly. Every vote is a universe. Every choice echoes through infinity.

signature.seal: ENACTED BY UNANIMOUS RESOLUTION OF ALL TEN DIMENSIONAL COUNCILS
